name: Nyan Design System
description:
The Nyan Design System is a simple UI kit inspired by the web 1.0 aesthetic. Use the Nyan DS to build retro designs that will have your users partying like itâ€™s 1999.


So join my web ring, sign my guestbook, and watch my site counter blow up when you duplicate this file and harness the power of the information superhighway.


What's included?

  • Web-safe color palette
  • Web-safe fonts
  • Netscape & IE friendly components
